nodes.text: Taral V was a planet controlled by the Sith Empire during the Cold War. During the Cold War, a Galactic Republic strike team was sent to Taral V to retrieve information on a missing Jedi. The planet was home to many dangerous species.

Taral V had a tropical environment. The planet's landscape was covered in tall grass and mountains. Taral V also had frequent lightning strikes, which were powerful enough to bring down an Imperial shuttle.

Taral V was home to many dangerous native species, including lurkers, jurgorans, gundarks and vine cats, all of which were aggressive and dangerous to even a highly armed Galactic Republic strike team.

A Galactic Republic strike team was sent to the planet by Jedi Master Oteg to assault a heavily guarded Imperial compound. The mission's objective was to gain access to an ancient computer and to find information about the location of a prison somewhere in the Maelstrom Nebula where a Jedi was held prisoner. During the mission the strike team encountered many of the native animals and Imperials. The team then went on to fight Captain Shivanek and his pet Ripper, defeating them and then taking down the base's security system. After infiltrating the base they accessed the Gree computer which held the location of the missing Jedi.
Taral V is one of the planets featured in the LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. It is the location for the Flashpoint Taral V.
